unit.comment: /** * @mainpage Subversion Documentation * * This documentation covers the public APIs provided by the Subversion * libraries. It is intended mainly for programmers, both those working * on Subversion itself, as well as developers of 3rd-party applications * intending to use these APIs. For more information about using Subversion, * see the Subversion Book at http://svnbook.red-bean.com/. * * To learn more about Subversion, please visit http://subversion.tigris.org/. */
